Description: Fragment of flat base of pottery mortarium with distinctive thread marks. Graffito underneath foot: E-shaped sign.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (p. 61, pl. XXXII, no. 75)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 646, no. 36)
Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (p.32 fig.3, p.41 no. 18)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (HA.08)
